welcome-user-page: Default text that will be used to create the user page when a user makes their first edit.
welcome-message-user:
Welcome message sent to new registered users.

Parameters:
* $1 - Name of the page the user edited
* $2 - Talk page of the welcoming user
* $3 - Signature of the welcoming user
welcome-message-anon:
Welcome message sent to anonymous users.

Parameters:
* $1 - Name of the page the user edited
* $2 - Talk page of the welcoming user
* $3 - Signature of the welcoming user
welcome-message-log: Edit summary used when leaving a message on the talk page
